text: The Source is an American music and entertainment news website and magazine. Created in 1988 by David Mays, it is the world's oldest rap publication.printed by using a copying machine: In 1995, The Source became the ultimate reference magazine for rap music. The magazine was often referred to as the Hip-Hop Bible. In 1999, it was the best-selling music magazine in America. But in 2009, the magazine began to lose readership and started to make less money. == History == The magazine's website began in 1998. It was celebrating its 100th issue. == References == Category:American magazines Category:Music magazines Category:American entertainment websites Category:Rap music
title: The Source
